articles.author: Milo Boyd
articles.content:
A Russian ghost-town abandoned when residents fled the freezing temperatures has been photographed.
The coal-mining city of Vorkuta used to known as a the Capital of the World, due to the many diffe… [+2495 chars]
articles.description: Vorkuta used to be known as the Capital of the World due to the large number of migrant workers attracted to its coal mines, before freezing temperatures as low as -50C caused its population to shrink
articles.title: Inside the coldest city in Europe that has become an eerie abandoned ghost town - Mirror Online

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.content: (Reuters) - Tottenham Hotspur's Europa League round-of-16 first and second- leg matches against Croatian side Dinamo Zagreb have been reversed due to a clash with north London rivals Arsenal, Europea… [+882 chars]
articles.description: (Reuters) -     Tottenham Hotspur's Europa League round-of-16 first and second- leg matches against Croatian side Dinamo Zagreb have been reversed due to a clash with north London rivals Arsenal, European soccer's governing body UEFA said on Monday.
articles.title: Tottenham's Europa last-16 games with Dinamo Zagreb reversed - The Star Online
